title: Chipotle Stock Still Has Room to Run, Analysts Say
text:
Chipotle Mexican Grill stock has soared in 2019, yet analysts think the burrito chain will remain on a roll.

The back story. Chipotle shares (ticker: CMG) have climbed nearly 90% year to date, well ahead of the S&P 500’s gains of just under 19%. Fast food stocks in general are having a great 2019, but Chipotle still leads the pack. Strong earnings, ongoing menu innovation, and analyst optimism that Chipotle could reach $1,000 a share have all contributed to the rally (one that’s been very profitable for the company’s...
description: Bullish analysts are confident about the burrito chain’s initiatives to drive traffic and ability to expand margins.
